Changelog:
Build 2024.4.27.1067
- Moved to local compilation over GitHub to prevent false positives with AntiVirus vendors.
- Removed unnecessary OpenSSL export.
- Added check to prevent loading Nexus into a process that isn't GW2.
- Fixed some logic related to disabling volatile addons and when they are being notified.
- Changed the QuickAccess offset setting to a DragSlider.
- Fixed addon config not saving when toggling auto-updates.
- Fixed a crash when importing certain settings from ArcDPS and the config file was malformed.
- Added Monospace font for certain Debug UI elements.
- Added a notification text when manually updating addons telling the user whether the addon was updated or is up-to-date.
- Fixed an internal crash of the loader in certain scenarios, preventing automatically picking up new addons or updates.

Build 2024.4.21.1287
- Removed Google Analytics. It was used to send an event when logging into the game to count unique Nexus users for the public release.

Build 2024.4.21.1070
- Removed Nexus loading ArcDPS plugins at runtime, to prevent a rare client crash. Might be added back in the future with a fix.
- Changed addon FreeLibrary logic to call only once as Nexus calls LoadLibrary only once.
- Fixed addons not saving (specifically ArcDPS) if they were set to  load on next game start.

Build 2024.4.20.939
- Added the event "EV_VOLATILE_ADDON_DISABLED" individually per addon. Payload is addon signature.
- Fixed a scenario in which changing the state of some addons would not be saved.- Removed the "Last-Modified" header check for EUpdateProvider::Direct. It was causing more issues than helping. It will be reintroduced at a later date.
- Added addon flag "OnlyLoadDuringGameLaunchSequence" for addons like ArcDPS that can not be loaded later.
- Fixed addons loading anyway when they updated, even if their state was disabled.

Build 2024.4.16.1166
- Fixed ArcDPS Library showing already installed plugins as downloadable.
- Added events for Unofficial Extras.
